Articles.Content: Is there any way to increase the LOD distance so you can see higher detailed textures from a higher altitude

As far as i know it is not possible to increase LOD distance for textures, except by increasing texture quality if it is not at max already.

But i think it is possible to increase LOD distance for the landscape mesh by increasing minDistance and/or maxSubdivision in KS_win\settings.cfg in the TERRAIN section.
